org.restlet.data
Class ChallengeScheme

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.data.ChallengeScheme

public final class ChallengeScheme
extends Object

Challenge scheme used to authenticate remote clients.

Author:
Jerome Louvel

public static ChallengeScheme valueOf(String name)
